text: Chuck Lorre Productions is a production company mainly used on television series, created by Chuck Lorre. == Filmography == === Television === Year Series Network 1993–1998 Grace Under Fire ABC 1995–1998 Cybill CBS 1997–2002 Dharma & Greg ABC 2003–2015 Two and a Half Men CBS 2007–2019 The Big Bang Theory CBS == Logo == The logo of Chuck lorre productions is the logo of Chuck Lorre Productions logo and various vanity cards. Category:American entertainment companies
title: Chuck Lorre Productions
